script
start !style_error(Unknown construction message:) Exception: scriptTable_1_0 deviceinstallation Test not run



Narrative

In order to make installed devices available and reachable As an OSP I want to make sure a device can register itself

Scenario: A device which is installed and performs first time registration.

script
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a valid register device OSLP message
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist a device that is installed but has not registered before
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the register device request is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the device should be updated with new deviceUID, IP address and device type
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the register device request should return a register device response
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the register response should contain the current UTC time
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the register response should contain GPS location from metadata
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the register response should contain timezone of platform

Scenario: A device which performs subsequent registration.

script
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a valid register device OSLP message
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist a device that is installed and has already registered on the platform
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the register device request is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the device should be updated with new deviceUID, IP address and device type
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the register device request should return a register device response
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the register response should contain the current UTC time
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the register response should contain GPS location from metadata
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the register response should contain timezone of platform

Scenario: Register device that already exists on the platform, without GPS metadata

script
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a valid register device OSLP message
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist a device that is installed and has already registered on the platform
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the device has no metadata for GPS
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the register device request is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the device should be updated with new deviceUID, IP address and device type
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the register device request should return a register device response
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the register response should contain the current UTC time
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the register response should NOT contain GPS location from metadata
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the register response should contain timezone of platform

Scenario: Register device that does not yet exist on the platform

script
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a valid register device OSLP message
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist a device that does not yet exist on the platform
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the register device request is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the device should not be created for security reasons
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the register device request should not return a response

Scenario: Register device with network address already in use by another device

script
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a valid register device OSLP message
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist a device that is installed and has already registered on the platform
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist another device exists using the same network address
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the register device request is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the device should be updated with new deviceUID, IP address and device type
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the network address for the other device should be cleared
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the register device request should return a register device response
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the register response should contain the current UTC time
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the register response should contain GPS location from metadata
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the register response should contain timezone of platform

  • Collapse All
